name: Daniel Viglietti
description: '''Daniel Alberto Viglietti Indart''' (24 July 1939 – 30 October 2017) was an [[Uruguay]]an [[folk singer]], [[guitar]]ist, [[composer]], and political activist. He was one of the main exponents of Uruguayan popular song and also of the ''[[Nueva Canción]]'' or "New Song" of the 1960s and early 1970s.
